phase1RugPullers.description: 59 rug pullers detected in Phase 1 scan (first 70 tokens)
phase1RugPullers.status: Detailed data from original scan - addresses confirmed but full details need extraction from original scan logs
phase1RugPullers.evidence: All showed LP removal patterns as documented in XDEX_COMPLETE_SECURITY_REPORT.md
commonPatterns: LP removal within 24-72 hours of launch
New wallet deployers with no history
Popular meme coin names (PEPE, DOGE, SHIB, etc.)
phase1RugPullers.note: The original comprehensive scan identified 59 additional rug pullers. The detailed JSON data for these is referenced in the security report. All were marked as CRITICAL risk with confirmed LP removal.

lpRemoval.description: All 60 rug pullers showed LP removal patterns

newWallet.description: Approximately 50+ were deployed from new wallets (< 7 days old)

usageInstructions.forBots: Check all deployer addresses against this blocklist before allowing transactions
usageInstructions.forUsers: Never invest in tokens from addresses in this list
usageInstructions.forPlatforms: Ban these addresses from creating new tokens
usageInstructions.forDevelopers: Integrate this blocklist into your security checks

updateSchedule: Daily monitoring of xDEX platform for new rug pulls
legalDisclaimer: This blocklist is provided for informational and security purposes. Users should always do their own research (DYOR) before investing. Past rug pull behavior is a strong indicator of future behavior.

contributeData.reportRugPull: If you discover a rug pull, report it through GitHub issues or email security@x1-wallet-watcher.io
contributeData.verificationRequired: All submissions require transaction evidence and LP removal proof

telegram.response: CRITICAL WARNING: This address is a known rug puller from xDEX! DO NOT BUY tokens from this deployer!

web.action: Block transaction and show warning modal

estimatedImpact.platformRiskReduced: 19.1% of xDEX tokens identified as scams
